title: 7 Black-Owned Dress Brands To Step Into Spring The Right Way
description: Spring isn’t just about a change in weather—it’s about a shift in energy, in mood, and of course, in wardrobe. With each new season comes a fresh start, and when we discuss spring style, we’re not just talking about trends; we’re talking about legacy, creativity, identity and craftsmanship that speak louder than trends or logos.From Andrea Iyamah to Sergio Hudson, we’re highlighting seven Black-owned dress brands that aren’t just making clothes—they’re making bold statements. So if you're ready to step into this new season with softness, confidence, head-turning energy, and just the right amount of flex, trust us—these are the brands you want in your rotation.Andrea Iyamah’s pieces are always a vibe! This dress embodies a vibrant, flirty appeal with a touch of sophistication. Known for celebrating individuality, the brand’s designs speak to your unique self-expression. Celebrities like Meagan Good have even been spotted rocking the Nigerian designer’s creations.Andrea Iyamah ODI DRESS - DANDI PRINT, $, available at Andrea IyamahMerging classic with a contemporary edge, Sergio Hudson nails it with this white-collar, belted, pleated mini shirtdress. It's a versatile piece that you can spice up or jazz down — either way, you can't go wrong with how you rock it. Simple yet sophisticated, it's a winning look that deserves a top spot in your spring wardrobe. Sergio Hudson Belted Pleated Mini Shirtdress, $, available at Saks Fifth AvenueVersatility is the name of the game when it comes to a Pantora design. With sizes ranging from XX-Small to 4X-Large, the brand offers a variety of options for every body type. The clothes are not only colorful and fun but are also eye-catching pieces that will have you feeling confident and giving main character vibes.Pantora Pantora Women's Wanda Draped Asymmetrical Wrap Dress, $, available at AmazonIf you're looking for a dress that balances comfort and style, this Rib Polo Sweater Minidress by Honor the Gift checks every box. Depending on how you pair it, this piece offers multi-dimensional appeal, allowing you to effortlessly transition from day to night. Also, with NBA All-Star Russell Westbrook as the brand's creative director, the fashion-forward energy is no surprise. Honor The Gift Rib Polo Sweater Minidress, $, available at NordstromYou know what they say about the color green — it symbolizes new beginnings, growth and renewal. In other words, it definitely gives a seasonal glow up. This lightweight, effortlessly chic dress features a low halter back and a side split that adds just the right amount of edge and soft, feminine flair. Consider it a great addition to your closet must-haves.House of Harlow x REVOLVE Frederick Dress, $, available at RevolveThis exclusive piece from the Theophilio Capsule Collection for Amazon Luxury Stores is more than just a fashion statement. It's an ode to the designer's Jamaican roots. The dress fits true to size and is the kind of piece that channels effortless Caribbean cool, making it just as wearable as it is meaningful.Theophilio Rasta Printed Backless Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonThis simple, haltered, form-fitting Orire dress is perfect for a night out on the town, date night or cocktail hour. The Nigerian-based, eco-friendly brand offers something for everyone, including price points that cater to all budgets without compromising on quality. Orire Orire Women's June Dress, $, available at AmazonLike what you see? html:
1 of 7

Andrea Iyamah’s pieces are always a vibe! This dress embodies a vibrant, flirty appeal with a touch of sophistication. Known for celebrating individuality, the brand’s designs speak to your unique self-expression. Celebrities like Meagan Good have even been spotted rocking the Nigerian designer’s creations.

2 of 7

Merging classic with a contemporary edge, Sergio Hudson nails it with this white-collar, belted, pleated mini shirtdress. It's a versatile piece that you can spice up or jazz down — either way, you can't go wrong with how you rock it. Simple yet sophisticated, it's a winning look that deserves a top spot in your spring wardrobe.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 7

Versatility is the name of the game when it comes to a Pantora design. With sizes ranging from XX-Small to 4X-Large, the brand offers a variety of options for every body type. The clothes are not only colorful and fun but are also eye-catching pieces that will have you feeling confident and giving main character vibes.

4 of 7

If you're looking for a dress that balances comfort and style, this Rib Polo Sweater Minidress by Honor the Gift checks every box. Depending on how you pair it, this piece offers multi-dimensional appeal, allowing you to effortlessly transition from day to night. Also, with NBA All-Star Russell Westbrook as the brand's creative director, the fashion-forward energy is no surprise.

5 of 7

You know what they say about the color green — it symbolizes new beginnings, growth and renewal. In other words, it definitely gives a seasonal glow up. This lightweight, effortlessly chic dress features a low halter back and a side split that adds just the right amount of edge and soft, feminine flair. Consider it a great addition to your closet must-haves.

6 of 7

This exclusive piece from the Theophilio Capsule Collection for Amazon Luxury Stores is more than just a fashion statement. It's an ode to the designer's Jamaican roots. The dress fits true to size and is the kind of piece that channels effortless Caribbean cool, making it just as wearable as it is meaningful.

7 of 7

This simple, haltered, form-fitting Orire dress is perfect for a night out on the town, date night or cocktail hour. The Nigerian-based, eco-friendly brand offers something for everyone, including price points that cater to all budgets without compromising on quality.
